lines.text: I don't give a monkey's arsehole about Mods and Rockers. Underneath, we're all the same, 'n't we?
No, Kev, that's it. Look, I don't wanna be the same as everybody else. That's why I'm a Mod, see? I mean, you gotta be somebody, ain't ya, or you might as well jump in the sea and drown.
Going to be one of the faces?
What do you mean going to be? I AM one of the faces!
If you don't work, you don't get paid no money. And I like money.
[on Kev's leather jacket]
'Ere, I never realized.
Never realized what?
You's a rocker.
What, am I black or something?
Well you ain't exactly white in that sort of get up, are you?
Bellboyyyyyy!
[from the cliff top after deciding not to be a mod]
[shouts]
Me!
Mr Cale tells me that you spent the weekend in Brighton, I imagine you were involved some extent in the disturbances there?
Yeah I was there
Weren't arrested or taken or anything like that were you?
No.

I must say I find your attitude incomprehensible. I feel I must warn you Cooper that we can't tolerate this kind of absentism amongst our junior staff. You got a good steady job here Cooper, plenty of young men would give their eye-teeth to be in your shoes.
Oh yeah! Well find one then
I beg your pardon?

You 'erd I said find one then. Yeah I'll tell you what you can do with your eye-teeth and your job, you can take the mail and the frankin machine and all that other rubbish I have to go about with and you can stuff them right up your arse!
You'll be getting like them bloody beatniks before you know it. Ban the bomb and do fuck all for a living pouncing about all day.
Chalky
[Standing outside a tenement building occupied by West Indian families]
This place gives me the shits, bloody nig-nogs everywhere. It's like bleedin' Calcutta around here.
Calcutta's in India.
Yeah, West India; it's where they bleedin' come from, ain't it?

[Fined for rioting in Brighton]
I'll pay now. Got a pen, judge?
